mapper.insert: insert into eco_enterprise ( `enterprise_id`, `enterprise_name`, `social_credit_code`, `registered_address`, `registered_time`, `registered_fund`, `employee_num`, `enterprise_scope`, `coordinates`, `enterprise_nature_code`, `enterprise_legal_person`, `legal_person_phone_number`, `environmental_protection_person`, `en_person_phone_number`, `safe_prodect_person`, `safe_per_phone_number`, `business_scope`, `business_area`, `business_area_nature_code`, `dept`, `taxpayer_code`, `market_code`, `surveyted_person_name`, `surveyted_person_position`, `full_form_time`, `survey_person_name`, `create_time`, `create_user_name`, `create_by`, `modify_time`, `modify_user_name`, `modify_by`, `delete_flag`, `administrative_division`, `urbanorrural`, `img_url` ) values ( #{enterpriseId}, #{enterpriseName}, #{socialCreditCode}, #{registeredAddress}, #{registeredTime}, #{registeredFund}, #{employeeNum}, #{enterpriseScope}, #{coordinates}, #{enterpriseNatureCode}, #{enterpriseLegalPerson}, #{legalPersonPhoneNumber}, #{environmentalProtectionPerson}, #{enPersonPhoneNumber}, #{safeProdectPerson}, #{safePerPhoneNumber}, #{businessScope}, #{businessArea}, #{businessAreaNatureCode}, #{dept}, #{taxpayerCode}, #{marketCode}, #{surveytedPersonName}, #{surveytedPersonPosition}, #{fullFormTime}, #{surveyPersonName}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(), #{createUserName}, #{createBy}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(), #{modifyUserName}, #{modifyBy}, '0', #{administrativeDivision}, #{urbanorrural}, #{imgUrl} )
mapper.update:
update eco_enterprise set `modify_time` = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(), `delete_flag` = '1' where enterprise_id in
#{enterpriseId}
